text:
• Active management of the third stage is mandatory.
• In addition, add oxytocin 20 U in one litre Sodium Chloride 0,9% immediately after delivery and observe for
bleeding. Do not remove the IV line for at least 12 hours.
• Monitor vital signs hourly, fluid balance and observe for postpartum haemorrhage for at least twelve hours.
• Manage associated pre-eclampsia
• Check Hb, platelet count, urea and creatinine on the day after delivery.
